assetsfolder.fieldDescription: Sets the path to assets needed for animation
assetsfolder.name: ./assetsfolder

desktopslidename.fieldDescription: Enter side name for desktop analytics tagging
desktopslidename.name: ./desktopslidename1

ctaurl.fieldDescription: Enter the URL for CTA link
ctaurl.name: ./ctalinkurl1

ctaurlParams.fieldDescription: Sets the link parameters applied to the button. e.g. param1=value1&param2=value2
ctaurlParams.name: ./ctaurlParams1

ctaanchorTag.fieldDescription: Sets an anchor tag thatâ€™s applied to the link generated for the navigation item.
ctaanchorTag.name: ./ctaanchorTag1

ctatarget.fieldDescription: Sets the window target of the link
ctatarget.name: ./ctatarget1

file.fieldDescription: Select Image for the CTA backaground
file.name: ./file
file.title: Upload Image Asset

alttext.fieldDescription: Enter the alternate text for the CTA Image
alttext.name: ./ctaimagealttext1

mobileslides.fieldDescription: Configure static slides for mobile view

mobileslidename.fieldDescription: Enter side name for mobile analytics tagging
mobileslidename.name: ./mobileslidename

mobilecarouselimage.fieldDescription: Click Browse to select the appropriate Carousel Image.
mobilecarouselimage.name: ./mobilecarouselimage

mobileimagealttext.fieldDescription: Enter the alternate text for the Mobile Carousel Image
mobileimagealttext.name: ./mobileimagealttext

displaycta.fieldDescription: Select to include CTA in the slide
displaycta.name: ./displaycta
